description:
Now Season of Red Boots! 
There's a cat wearing boots! I wonder why. 
What will happen to poor Caraba? 

★ Cat who uses trickery and deceit for his master 
★ High quality illustrated and Vivid narration job 
★ Universal Designed for both iPhone & iPad 

PART OF THE STORY 
Where do you think Puss got his good ideas? Do you think it was the boots? If you ever see boots like that, let me know? 

HELLOSTORY - Kids Storybook 
* Featured by Apple as Apps for Kids Stories - May 2012
* Chosen as "New and Noteworthy" and "What's Hot" - March 2012
* #10 Ranking Book Category in more than 10 countries
* Chosen as New Book Category in UK,US,Canada,South Korea
* Worldwide downloaded over 180,000 Times

ANIMATION BOOK 
* The Great art work story images 
* Best narrator for your kids 
* The New Games : Puzzle, Magic ink 
* Wonderfully rich background sound for each scene 
* The automatic or Manual Page turning allows you easy viewing of the stories 

FEATURES 
“Read To Me” - listen to the easy-to-understand narrated story 
“Auto Page” - automatically reading and turning pages 
“Subtitle” - allows you to control subtitle for your children 
“Puzzles & Magic ink”- enjoy Interactive puzzles & magic ink throughout the story 
“Language” - English & Korean

REVIEW 
“TheiPhoneAppReview.com” ( Rating: ★★★★☆ ) 
It is a child-friendly story, and parents and teachers can use this app in their homes or classrooms for story-telling purposes. 
“apps4kids” 
A really strong production with nice illustrations, animations and sound. A great choice! 

────────────────────── 
Brand New Reading Experience! More Than a Animation Book reading Effect 

We have been inviting some of the best illustrators to create illustrated stories for us. 
Exquisite Picture, vivid narration as well as animation and interactive features bring you and your children wonderful stories and a brand new reading experience. 
We have carefully selected various stories, including well-Known classic fairy tales and new original stories, to give you many options to find the ones you love. 
Additionally, we will continuously updated the books on iTunes, so that you can read our illustrated stories at anywhere and anytime. 

Follow us: twitter.com/Kidstorybookww 
Like us: facebook.com/pages/Kid-story-books
